Reviews.Title: awful product
Reviews.Author: Charnette Zaskoda
Reviews.Content: It looked like a bargain.  It was a headache. The shutter time was so slow. Blurry pictures. I sent it back.

Reviews.Title: My Cobra purchase
Reviews.Author: Maureen Troy
Reviews.Content: We took the camera on vacation and I never realized that the setting I was using was incorrect. Now that I know, the pictures are really quite good.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.0 Megapixel
8X Digital Zoom
2.4" Lcd
Face Detection
Micro Secure Digital Card Slot
ProductInfo.Name: Cobra Digital DCA1215 RED 12 MP Digital Camera with 8 x Optical Zoom (Red)
